name: Monster Typer Backspace
description:
ENTER a new world, a fresh TYPO experience—an ESCAPE from reality deep within outer SPACE. Welcome to Earth-3.

Monster Typer Backspace is a fast-paced, zany typing game designed for everyone, featuring simple controls (typing) and easy-to-learn mechanics.

- Compete against typists around the world on the online leaderboard.
- Learn about the monsters in the Monster Database.
- Every day is a different seed for everyone to compete in.
